titles.title: God Leads Us Along (takes a little work)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Some thru the waters Some thru the flood Some thru the fire But all thru the blood Some thru great sorrow But God gives a song In the night season And all the day long{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In shady green pastures So rich and so sweet God leads His dear children along Where the water's cool flow Bathes the weary one's feet God leads His dear children along{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sometimes on the mount Where the sun shines so bright God leads His dear children along Sometimes in the valley In darkest of night God leads His dear children along{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tho sorrows befall us And Satan oppose God leads His dear children along Through grace we can conquer Defeat all our foes God leads His dear children along{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Away from the mire And away from the clay God leads His dear children along Away up in glory Eternity's day God leads His dear children along{/lang-eng}
